benchmark_details.name: WTU-Eval (Whether-or-Not Tool Usage Evaluation Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: WTU-Eval assesses LLMs with eleven datasets to evaluate their ability to discern tool usage and capability boundaries.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To explore whether LLMs can discern their ability boundaries and use tools flexibly.

data.source: The benchmark includes eleven datasets, consisting of six tool-usage datasets and five general datasets.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on exact match and various evaluation methods across tool and general datasets.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better ability to discern tool usage.
methodology.baseline_results: Comparisons made to previous models evaluations.
